website_summaries.verdict: Between its pair of iconic heroes and vehicles, this Batman set is a fantastic value and a great idea as a “my first action figures” gift.
pros: Includes Batman and Batmobile, as well as Robin and his Cycle
Batmobile lights up and launches 3 included orange discs
cons: Doesn’t include any villains to blast

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Batman and Robin toy
customer_reviews.text: A favorite at our house. The Batmobile shoots the yellow disks from the trunk and has a storage spot there so they don't get lost when not in play. Robin's motorcycle stands well on its own.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Farsace

customer_reviews.title: Fun set for kids
customer_reviews.text: The Fisher-Price Imaginext DC Super Friends, Batmobile & Cycle is a fun set for kids 3-8 years old. It comes with Batman, Robin, the Batmobile & a motorcycle. The Batmobile headlights work when the button on the underside of the orange "roll bar" is pushed. There is a launcher on the back of the Batmobile that once flipped up will launch the included disks. Because this is going to be a gift, we only were able to try the headlights and not the launcher, but the whole set looks like fun!
customer_reviews.author: citrushome

customer_reviews.title: He's happy makes me Happy
customer_reviews.text: Gave this toy as a gift , from what I hear the child loves it. plays with it all the time. even wanted to bring it to school. but that's a not allowed. He's happy makes me Happy. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret   Blanco

customer_reviews.title: nana nana nana nana batmannnn
customer_reviews.text: This product was a little smaller than I anticipated when ordering, but it was packaged nicely and is a cute little toy set. My son absolutely loves it! It has headlights on the batmobile that you can easily light up with the touch of a button. The car lights are actually quite bright. Batman and Robin can ride together in the car which he loves, but it also had the separate motorcycle just for Robin. This toy is easy for him to play with at the age of 4 and he has a good imagination and he really loves this brand of toys.
customer_reviews.author: xreviewqueen

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old son really liked it. And the toys were just the right size for his little hands. There are no small pieces in the set so that was a plus as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: We got these for my son(4 1/2) to go with the Batcave he was getting for Christmas. He loves it and loves Robin's Motorcycle especially. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: KaleighJ

customer_reviews.title: A winner
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this set for my nephew who is disabled and has trouble handling some toys. He loves cars and action figures with special features, such as launching flying discs, transforming, et cetera. He absolutely loves this set, which fits the bill in every way. It gets played with often, is sturdy enough to hold up to abuse, and didn't break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: Jason O.

customer_reviews.title: Robin lost his cape!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a 5 year old who is a huge Robin fan. He asked for this gift but when it arrived he was pretty upset to find that Robin didn't have a cape! I looked up some pictures of Robin and it does look like he usually wears a cape. Our 5 year old enjoys this toy though and got over the lack of cape pretty quickly :)
customer_reviews.author: Bill S.

customer_reviews.title: Hours of imaginative play
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves to play with Batman and Robin in their vehicles. He hasn't lost the two discs because he's constantly playing with them! Item arrived in packaging, brand new in excellent condition. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: LotusEclipse

customer_reviews.title: He definitely enjoyed playing with it
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift at a 6 year old boys birthday party. Was a huge hit. He definitely enjoyed playing with it!
customer_reviews.author: Janna Gardner

customer_reviews.title: so fun
customer_reviews.text: super cool toy, lights are very very cool. Very good quality and great toy to incentivize imagination and it can be used with other imaginext or even marvel (same size) toys.
customer_reviews.author: Kat lim Ruiz Kuan

customer_reviews.title: Get him, Batman!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to our nephew for Christmas and he went nuts with it right away! I didn't pay attention when purchasing to notice that it shoots discs. Just be prepared that at some point you as a parent are going to be the "bad guy" and Batman will likely shoot you with a plastic disc a time or two (or more likely, about a hundred times!)
customer_reviews.author: Pofsa

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun for a young boy!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute toys for a 5 year old boy. A little pricey, but so it goes with Batman items right now. The little boy we gifted this to loved it. Some of the parts are a little small, so this might not be appropriate for a really small child. It's neat that Batman AND Robin can ride in the Batmobile!
customer_reviews.author: SEC123

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy
customer_reviews.text: My 4yo loves batman and this was the perfect Christmas gift. The only thing I would change is that it only shoots one disk at a time. It is cool that the highlights turn on like a flashlight though
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Batmoblie Headlights Broke In 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a Christmas present for my 3 year old son. 6 months later the headlights in the batmobile no longer work. Replaced the batteries and nope. Dead! Really said as he is really into Batman. Even more upset that I spent an extra $10 on batteries and that wasn’t even the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this toy for a little boy’s fourth birthday. It had the best value for what the toy was and came with accessories. He really enjoyed it and played with it the whole party
customer_reviews.author: Chamaole

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great value with combo of Batman and Robin in this set! The Batmobile even have light on it! My son would even take Robin to have shower with him every night.
customer_reviews.author: Polly Fung

customer_reviews.title: Another one of grandsons fav bday gift
customer_reviews.text: He wouldn't stop playing with all of this stuff the whole bday party! All the kids love this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Fun to collect
customer_reviews.text: This is a unique set. My husband is collecting these lately and has taken a liking to the designs. They are very similar to the old comic books for way less price and if you can get over the kid fun faces of the figures then it’s fun to own
customer_reviews.author: TamarBenz007

customer_reviews.title: Big hit, thumbs up from everyone!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my 4yo grandson. He couldn’t wait to get it out of the package and play with Batman and Robin! (All the aunts, uncles, and cousins were happy playing with it also!!)
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Super cool toy
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift and I didn’t realize that the head lights turned on!!! My 3 year old nephew loved this set. My 5 year old and 7 year old also enjoyed playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Keller

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old loves them
customer_reviews.text: A great toy for my Superhero-loving four year old. The Batman and Robin are the perfect size to carry around in his small hands and he loved that it came with two vehicles (one for each hero). We've got a happy little guy over here.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Faust

customer_reviews.title: Great Batman toy
customer_reviews.text: Batman and robin! Comes with both cars and characters. I got this on sale. Son loves this!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Love Imaginext
customer_reviews.text: Well made toy, my son has been playing with these for years and just purchased for my 2 year old nephew.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I would give this item 10 stars of I could. Nice looking and sturdy. You get more than your money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Bryannt

customer_reviews.title: Great for grandson
customer_reviews.text: Great gist for grandson. He loves every piece of it.
customer_reviews.author: T Roach

customer_reviews.title: Fun Toy !
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this toy. The pieces are just the right size. I did not let him have the disc that come with them because I did not know if he would put them in his mouth. The lights on the car are cool too !
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for 4yr old grandson. He played with it all night! Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Candis M.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice toy, kept my little grandson intertwined all day Christmas day
customer_reviews.author: lois schebler

customer_reviews.title: Storage for disks and LED lights
customer_reviews.text: Love this toy! Storage for disks and bright blue head lights. Shoots great and easy to use. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Batman, Robin, Batmobile and motorcycle
customer_reviews.text: Great little set. The batmobile headlights light up and can shoot discs
customer_reviews.author: Clarence Poopsey Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for grand from paw paw. All smiles a 5 star hit
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! My son absolutely loves it! Great Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marie Hamrick

customer_reviews.title: HEAVY DUTY BUILT TOUGH
customer_reviews.text: THE "GUYS" ARE HIGH QUALITY PLASTIC, TOUGH BAT MOBILE PERFECT FOR BOYS THAT PLAY ROUGH
customer_reviews.author: Luann

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this car. Carries Batman and robin all over, they are small so can get lost easy!
customer_reviews.author: Francis Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for a 5 year old. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly 5

customer_reviews.title: I tecommend
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this toy! Figure and disk are great for kids from 4-7
customer_reviews.author: Alice Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Present for my 3 year old son, he loves it!! My only complaint is that it's hard to place batman in the batmobile.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Cole

customer_reviews.title: Doubles as a flashlight!
customer_reviews.text: My son has played with this everyday since Christmas (about a month). Two characters, two vehicles and the car shoots discs.

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this toy! It’s always nearby and we consider it to be safe for him at 2 1/2 years old.

customer_reviews.title: Great playset!
customer_reviews.text: Great playset! Both my son and daughter love this toy. Excellent build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki VinHatton

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grand daughter we play batman and robin and she loves the car and the little projectile is a cool feature. this is the old school body of the batmobile for all you cats over 45 years old you remember the days when you only had 4 or 5 channels watching batman after school

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for a Batman fan!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old son loves this toy! Even months later- he still chooses it!
customer_reviews.author: I can see clearly now...

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price Imaginext DC Super Friends, Batmobile & Cycle, What’s the coolest way for kids to cruise around Gotham City
product_meta.description:
Cruising in the Batmobile is cool because it lights up when kids press a button, and it’s equipped with a launcher that lets kids fire disks at any and all villains that plague Gotham City. Robin might say it’s cool to cruise Gotham City on his cycle. Either way, imagination kicks into high gear as kids role play different adventures with their favorite Dynamic Duo!

BRAND STORY
By Fisher Price
feature_bullets: Squeeze button to light up Batmobile!
Flip launcher up, then use slider to fire disks at villains! (Villains sold separately.)
Robin fits on cycle—roll him along to the next crime-fighting adventure!
Includes Batmobile, Cycle, Batman and Robin figures, and 3 disks
Squeeze button to light up Bat mobile!
Flip launcher up, then use slider to fire disks at villains! (Villains sold separately)
Robin fits on cycle-roll him along to the next crime-fighting adventure!
Includes Batmobile, Cycle, Batman and Robin figures, and 3 disks
Kids will love recreating their favorite adventures from Batman!

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
